name: Draft Horse
description: A large, muscular horse bred for heavy labor with broad legs and a calm temperament, ideal for work and transportation.
memorable: Known for its exceptional strength and ability to carry heavy loads across long distances.
goals: Typically used for pulling carts and transporting goods, especially in farming and merchant activities.
relations: Often found working alongside farmers, merchants, and traveling caravans.
environment: Commonly found in rural areas, farms, and on trade routes.
strengths: Exceptional physical capability reflected in its high Strength score, making it ideal for heavy lifting.
weaknesses: Relatively easy to hit due to its low Armor Class and not specially trained for combat.
attacks: Can deliver bludgeoning damage with its hooves in melee combat.
most_powerful_ability: Can carry armored knights or pull siege engines, showcasing its strength.
senses: Has a passive Perception score of 10, allowing it to notice basic threats.
skills: No specific skill proficiencies, but possesses average awareness.
additional_information: Bred for heavy labor and transportation.
Not as fast as riding horses but very durable.
Can serve as a reliable mount for adventurers.
Typically used in farming and by traveling caravans.
High Strength makes it effective for physical tasks.
test_queries: calm horse bred for heavy labor
muscular horse capable of pulling carts
